sentences.en: ...crushed ice.
sentences.cn: …碎冰。

sentences.en: Andrew crushed his empty can.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁压扁了他的空罐子。

sentences.en: Crush two cloves of garlic.
sentences.cn: 捣两瓣大蒜。

sentences.en: Don't crush this box; it has flowers in it.
sentences.cn: 别把这只箱子压坏, 它里边装的是花.

sentences.en: Every-where he went he was mobbed by a crush of fans.
sentences.cn: 他所到之处都有成群的歌迷簇拥着他。

sentences.en: Franklin and his thirteen-year-old son somehow got separated in the crush.
sentences.cn: 富兰克林和他13岁的儿子在人群中被挤散了。

sentences.en: His leg was crushed in the accident.
sentences.cn: 他的腿在事故中被压断。

sentences.en: How many tons of ore can this machine crush in an hour?
sentences.cn: 这机器每小时可以破碎多少吨矿石?

sentences.en: I'll crush the juice out of oranges for you.
sentences.cn: 我榨柳橙汁给你喝.

sentences.en: It concerned her that Bess was developing a crush on Max.
sentences.cn: 贝丝迷上了马克斯，这让她很担心。

sentences.en: Peel and crush the garlic.
sentences.cn: 把蒜剥皮并捣碎。

sentences.en: She had a crush on you, you know.
sentences.cn: 她曾爱慕你，你是知道的。

sentences.en: Such a crush of finery and folly she had never seen.
sentences.cn: 她可从未见过如此华丽挥霍的盛况.

sentences.en: The revolution was crushed within days.
sentences.cn: 几天之内这场革命就被镇压了。

sentences.en: There was such a crush on the train that I could hardly breathe.
sentences.cn: 列车上这么拥挤我几乎透不过气来.

sentences.en: They reckoned he was a hatchet man, out to shred the workforce and crush the union.
sentences.cn: 他们估计他是上司派来的刽子手，专门对工人大开杀戒，大肆镇压工会。

sentences.en: This machine is made to crush the rock into powder.
sentences.cn: 这台机器是用来把石头压成碎末的.

sentences.en: This machine is used to crush the rock up for road building.
sentences.cn: 这台机器用于碎石,以供筑路之需.

sentences.en: Two people were crushed to death in the rush to escape.
sentences.cn: 两个人在逃生过程中被踩死。

sentences.en: We can't crush any more people into the hall; it's crowded already.
sentences.cn: 我们再也不能让更多的人进入大厅了, 里面已经很挤了.

sentences.en: You can't crush so many people into the classroom.
sentences.cn: 不能让这么多人挤进教室.

words.tran_cn: 压倒的；决定性的；不能站起来；支离破碎的
打击；[食品] 压碎机；压碎的东西；镇服人的事实
压破，征服，冲入（crush的过去式和过去分词形式）
粉碎；迷恋；压榨；拥挤的人群

phrases.tran_cn: 抗压，抗压溃性能；粉碎抵抗；抗破碎性

trans.tran_en: a crowd of people pressed so close together that it is difficult for them to move

trans.tran_cn: 挤，压坏，捣碎，镇压，使消沉
trans.tran_en: to press something so hard that it breaks or is damaged

trans.tran_cn: 压碎， 碾碎； 摧毁， 压垮
trans.tran_en: to press something so hard that it breaks or is damaged
to press something so hard that it breaks or is damaged
